title: Boss of World Economic Forum quits after links to Epstein revealed
desc: Børge Brende admitted dining with the convicted sex offender on three occasions between 2018 and 2019

title: Albanese celebrates his caucus unity but it comes at a cost
desc: Behind the scenes, the troops are carefully managed. Opinions are expressed at factional meetings and the prime minister meets with the factional conveners.

title: Live: Hillary Clinton testifies before Congress about Epstein relationship
desc: The former US Secretary of State testifies she "had no idea" of Epstein crimes as she calls for President Trump to be questioned.

title: NASA shakes up leadership of human spaceflight program in wake of critical Starliner report
desc: NASA has replaced two bigwigs in its human spaceflight program, just a week after releasing a report criticizing how the agency handled the first crewed flight of Boeing's Starliner astronaut taxi.

title: Gianni Infantino at 10 years: Growth, controversy and the reshaping of FIFA
desc: The Swiss-born administrator is clearly a football obsessive, but his decade atop the game has seen him become a polarizing figure - even if he has championed the spread of the beautiful game.

title: Gianni Infantino at 10 years: Growth, controversy and the reshaping of FIFA
desc: The Swiss-born administrator is clearly a football obsessive, but his decade atop the game has seen him become a polarizing figure - even if he has championed the spread of the beautiful game.

title: Stocks Pare Losses as Oil Drops on US-Iran Talks: Markets Wrap
desc: (Bloomberg) -- Wall Street traders lifted stocks away from session lows as oil erased its gain amid signs of progress in US nuclear talks with Iran. Chipmakers sank as Nvidia Corp.’s results failed to inspire investors seeking reassurances about artificial intelligence. Bonds rose.

title: Very Early ART Initiation in Children With HIV Could Lead to ART-Free Remission
desc: Three children still aviremic off ART provide hope that more cases are possible

title: Premier League to launch Singapore streaming service for 2026-27
desc: The Premier League will launch its first direct-to-customer streaming service in Singapore next season - and is looking to see how it could be "replicated all around the world".
